text:
I'm trying to continue the OpenBLAS 64 bits on ARM adventure. Is there some special trick for the SuiteSparse version depending on OpenBLAS?
Specifically, OpenBLAS v0.3.10+4 was released recently, is there something special to make SuiteSparse depend on it?

elements.text:

text: I think OpenBLAS doesn't change much in terms of compatibility, so I'm not sure I understand your question
